docblock.description: class: XmlTree purpose: import an xml structure into a sql NestedSet structure Focus: Data/tree consistency
class: TreeAdapter purpose: batch processing & transaction handling Focus: Data/tree consistency
SqlTree Tree data structure in a SQL Table.
docblock.long-description: To create and manage a nested set tree structure in a SQL Database. Infinite child nodes possible with linear runtime. The objects created have a nodepointer, you navigate either wit the insert functions or with the levelUp(). Focus: Data/tree consistency

constant.name: QUERYS
constant.value: array('SELECT_WHERE_ID' => 'SELECT :id, :rgt, :lft, :parent, :name FROM :table WHERE :id=:value_id LIMIT 0,1', 'SELECT_TOP_RGT' => 'SELECT :rgt FROM :table ORDER BY :rgt DESC LIMIT 0, 1', 'SELECT_COUNT_ENTRIES' => 'SELECT n.:name, COUNT(*)-1 AS level, ROUND ((n.rgt - n.lft - 1) / 2) AS offspring FROM :table AS n, :table AS p WHERE n.:lft BETWEEN p.:lft AND p.:rgt GROUP BY n.:lft ORDER BY n.:lft;', 'UPDATE_PARENTS_RGT' => 'UPDATE :table SET :rgt = :rgt +2 WHERE :rgt >= :value_rgt', 'UPDATE_PARENTS_LFT' => 'UPDATE :table SET :lft = :lft +2 WHERE :lft > :value_rgt', 'INSERT_NODE' => 'INSERT INTO :table (:lft, :rgt, :parent, :name) VALUES(:value_lft, :value_rgt, :value_parent, :value_name)')

tag.name: var
tag.description: QUERYS Sql querys nescessary to manage the tree structure

tag.name: var
tag.description: stack of node id's last element is the id of the last node inserted

docblock.description: Validation of database/pdo object & table columns closes connection on error
Validation of database/pdo object & table columns closes connection on error
Connects to the database and creates a \PDO object nescessary for the constructor
Get a node by id
Returns an array with error messages.
Add a node at current position at the same level as current node.
Add a Subnode at current position.
Add a root node
Validates the table tree structure and commits/rolls back the transaction
puts the cursor a level higher.
commit/rollback the transaction.
prepares pdo statements and bind static params such as tablename and column names.
Yes 2x times :value_rgt is correct!
closes the database connection.
just in case there is an uncommited transaction or open database connection.

parse_markers.error: Argument $dbCreds is missing from the Docblock of __construct
Argument $columns is missing from the Docblock of __construct
Argument $name is missing from the Docblock of createRootNode
